text: Egha Moses ua kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Ofa gamir gumazibar dapanim arazir kuram damightɨ, an arazir kurar kam gumazamizibar amutɨ, me bar osɨmtɨzim ikiam. Kamaghɨn, a bulmakaun apurir bar aghuir duaba an mɨkarzimɨn puvatɨzir tam inigh. Egh uan arazir kuraba gɨn amangɨsɨ, Ikiavɨra Itir God bagh arazir kuraba gɨn amadir ofa damigh.
